metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to CrecheTeenager01 in the dormitory.

0.speaker: Youth Mirya'al
0.text: Vlaakith... Vlaakith'ka... sivim hra... sivim hrath krash'ht. Was that right?
0.context: NodeContext: full phrase they are struggling with is "Vlaakith'ka sivim hrath krash'ht." said "VLAH-kith-kah SIV-im HRATH KRAHSH-het" - meaning "only in vlaakith may we find light"

1.speaker: Youth Mirya'al
1.text: I'm watching you, istik... I'm sure the Inquisitor will want to hear my report.
1.context: NodeContext: last sentence whispered conspiratorially to self

2.speaker: Youth Mirya'al
2.text: Rest time feels so wasteful. I could be training right now.

3.speaker: Youth Mirya'al
3.text: Istik! Are you supposed to be here? Maybe I should report you to the sa'varsh.
